physical_examinations.vital_signs: Blood pressure: hypertension, mean pulmonary artery pressure: 43 mmHg
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bilateral pseudophakia, basal systolic murmur radiating to the right axilla and back, no renal artery bruit, normal funduscopy
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Fatigue worsened progressively and was associated with atypical chest pain.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Echocardiography showed mild bilateral peripheral pulmonary artery stenoses, small patent ductus arteriosus, normal biventricular function
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat catheterization confirmed mild peripheral pulmonary artery stenosis.
